__TOC__


== Acer Aspire 5610 ==

=== Ubuntu Lucid Lynx USB Live ===

==== Comments ====
'''Beta 2''': All tried tests worked correctly. However Network Tools crashed when I clicked on the pings tab, see <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/567923 | bug report]]</nowiki>.

'''Release Candidate''': All tried tests worked correctly. However:

* Network Tools still crashed (see <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/murrine/+bug/549281 | bug report]]</nowiki>).

* Totem crashed once (apparently for no reason). See <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/totem/+bug/556260| bug report]]</nowiki>.
